description: Crashes all the time, overly complicated too.
I love Kleopatra, but it will no longer open on Fedora. Tried REL and Flatpack, to no avail.
Doesn't show any certificate, doesn't allow importing any certificate
While Kleopatra is effective, there is other PGP software that provides a better experience.

I honestly don't have run into any issues with Kleopatra.
It's simple and much like GPG Suite on macOS.
Does what it should. No qualms.
not user friendly. loads of bugs, crashes a lot and its just complicated and dumb

It runs just fine and is very straight forward, especially given that is handles both PGP and X509 formats. In fact, I have yet to find another program that provides for both as an integrated solution. Yes there are more streamlined options for handling the two formats seperately, but if you are looking for a consolidated encryption / verification certificate application, then this is the best, and to my knowledge, the only option.

Encryption and signing security is not a trivial matter. The most common uses are the X509 certificates provided through centralized authorities. These are primarily used by medium and larger corporations to ensure their software is authentic. However, that provides virtually zero security to the common user. For most small businesses and individuals, the cost of an X509 is prohibative. Hence the wide use of PGP, but this format demands a much higher degree of knowledge and effort upon the part of the user.

Kleopatra provides an elegant single source option for handling both formats in a clear side by side presentation to allow users at all levels (personal through system admin) the access required to facilitate whatever level of security they desire. While this may be excessive for those who simply wish to sign or encrypt personal emails to a small group of aquaintences, that is not, and never has been, the goal of this type of security. This is meant to provide for signing of all transmitted documents (email and otherwise) and for encryption of any file, directory, folder, drive, etc. through a single point of access control. In that roll Kleopatra is efficient, effective, minimal, and essentially functionally unique.
Works Great and Easy to use.
Cause it sure qualifies!
summary: Was this built as a crash test dummy?

description: Does not export my public key. Not even when ran as root. Private key exports just fine.
KDE Plasma 5, works beautifully - no issues with the applicataion at all.
Works as expected.

Kleo needs a little break every now and then, but Mark Anthony will do that to a chica

Currently she won't even load anymore, like she went on strike or something?

So I can't use her at all, on Fedora 38 workstation
Nutze das Programm regelmässig zur Verschlüsselung Datensicherung. Alles ohne Probleme.
Makes PGP pretty easy. Also encryption with a password is possible, though its not AES, Twofish or the like.

Es ist alles Erdenkliche im Bereich pgp / Verschlüsselung möglich. Die Zwischenablage lässt sich einfach über das Kontextmenü des Kleopatra Tray Symbols ver / entschlüsseln.
Das GUI ist sehr schön und unkompliziert mit Qt6 realisiert worden.
summary: Bestes Tool im Bereich pgp / Verschlüsselung !

description:
Aunque para alguien sin mucho conocimiento del tema puede ser difícil de usar, la GUI está muy bien diseñada y es muy intuitiva, a su vez, está muy mantenida por la comunidad.
Recomendada sin duda.
Interfaz intuitiva, versátil y fácil de utilizar, si tienes conocimientos mínimos.

Una vez se entiende es fácil de utilizar, pero antes hay que tener claro que son las claves PGP y conocer las diferencias y el uso de las claves privada y pública. Para eso hay que documentarse un poco buscando en internet
summary: Muy buena aplicación y más que recomendable extender su uso

description:
Excelente interfaz, muchísimas opciones de importación/exportación, rápida, segura, estable.
5/5
Советую всем данное приложение!
Есть проблема в создании пары ключей в alt linux 10.1 образование (xfce/kde) - нельзя создать сертификат, защищенный паролем = "ошибка ввода пароля"
summary: Есть проблема в создании пары ключей

description: 很容易上手，PGP新手也可以使用的图形界面前端
